TopicTitle: What to add to a base on another planet.

Articles.Content:
I was having trouble coming up with ideas to add to my Duna base so I made this list.

I encourage you to use these ideas when ever you want.

Please tell me more ideas so we can keep expanding this list.

1.Huts

Hitch hiker containers that look like little huts :3

2.Self Destruct system

What? Every base needs it in case of an emergency!

3.Rovers

Let your Kerbals explore the planet/moon!

4.Refueling station

For rovers. You never want to run out of fuel!

5.A lighter-uper-erÃ¢â€žÂ¢

A huge main area that lights up kilometers of the planet at night =D

6.Transport rover

A rover that moves huts using docking.

7.Clothes line

It's a good idea!

That's All I got for now!

Idea that might be doable. Remote controlled rover space football/soccer. I am also thinking by using the remote sat mod, it might even be possible to play multiplayer turn based RCR football/soccer. The time set between turns would be dependent on the distance from Kerbal the game is played due to the time delay effect. Eg must send command(compleat your turn) before the signal (of apposing player) reaches their rover. A bit like the clocks in competitive chess.

Train of thought. Just popped into my head.
